thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 02 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Dine Brands Reports Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $1.11

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Dine Brands Reports Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $1.11
text:
May 2 (Reuters) - Dine Brands Global Inc:
* DINE BRANDS GLOBAL, INC. REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS
* Q1 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.92 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.10 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* QTRLY TOTAL REVENUES $188.2 MILLION VERSUS $191.5 MILLION
* APPLEBEE’S DOMESTIC SYSTEM-WIDE COMPARABLE SAME-RESTAURANT SALES INCREASED 3.3% FOR Q1 OF 2018
* IHOP’S DOMESTIC SYSTEM-WIDE COMPARABLE SAME-RESTAURANT SALES INCREASED 1.0% FOR Q1 OF 2018
* REITERATES ITS FINANCIAL PERFORMANCE GUIDANCE FOR FISCAL 2018 CONTAINED IN PRESS RELEASE ISSUED ON FEBRUARY 20, 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
